review_title: A good starter job for the RN

pros: Working at this hospital is a great way to learn for new nurses. Most of the workers truly show they care about each other.

review_title: Used to be a nice place to work
pros: Safe campus, cafeteria has fairly good food for reasonable prices
cons: Duke life point took over and it's going down hill fast. Understaffed, under paid, under appreciated. Upping patient to staff ratio while not hiring. When they do hire, orientation is very short,in the end the patients themselves are not safe due to staffing guidelines. Management makes new policies on a whim that are completely unrealistic. Benefits are awful.
